name: ScoopiScoopi
description:
ScoopiScoopi wants to play hide-and-seek with you! Find ScoopiScoopi and friends in a park, and gather stickers in your own sticker album. How would you accessorize the park with your awesome stickers? Count to 10 and let's go!
ScoopiScoopi was made in Pikku Kakkonen Game Jam by Finnish Game Jam organization.

Best gaming experience in tablet platform with Android system. Also available to be played on PC.

Programming:
Sebastian Laitila

Art:
Ari Lehtiniemi
Marie Kumpulainen
Janika Kaarnioja

Concept artists:
Christian, 5
Saara, 7
Severi, 6
Sonja, 6
Suvi, 11

The game contains sound effects from Freesound by following artists:
Duckduckpony
Jorickhoofd
Ripper351
Andre Rocha Nascimento

Voice actors:
Iida
Liina
Nooa
Oliver
Sebastian
